sentences.en: Action Coincidentally, Podolski's strike partner, Miroslav Klose, is also of Polish descent.
sentences.cn: 是, 波多尔斯基的锋线搭档米罗斯拉夫?克洛泽也是一名波兰后裔.

sentences.en: Coincidentally two thieves arrived at the house at the same time.
sentences.cn: 两个小偷碰巧同时到了那所房子.

sentences.en: Coincidentally, he was also a teacher.
Coincidentally, I had once found myself in a similar situation.
sentences.cn: 巧得很，我曾经碰到过类似的情况。

sentences.en: Coincidentally, in the middle, Xun and Li also co - starred.
sentences.cn: 巧合的是, 在中, 周迅又与孙俪合作出演.

sentences.en: Coincidentally, they share the same birthday, 23 years apart.
sentences.cn: 巧合的是, 他们有着相同的生日, 23岁分开.

sentences.en: It was found coincidentally following the detection of hypopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 我们提出一下咽癌同时合并有前臂皮肤远处转移之病例.

sentences.en: More coincidentally, five of the midwives have been mothers of twins themselves.
sentences.cn: 更为巧合的是, 医院中有五位助产士也分别是双胞胎的妈妈.

sentences.en: Not coincidentally, cities began to take shape at about the same time.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 城市开始成型,这并非巧合.

sentences.en: Quite coincidentally, metamorphic viruses apply transformations that go the other way around.
sentences.cn: 十分巧合, 变形病毒使用的变换有异曲同工之妙.

sentences.en: She told me that coincidentally, she has something to tell me too.
sentences.cn: 巧得很,她也同样告诉我, 她也有些事情想情想跟我说.

sentences.en: These properties of MSC can reduce the above problems in HSC coincidentally.
sentences.cn: 而MSC的 这些特性恰好可以减少hsc中的以上问题.

sentences.en: They immediately got in touch with Dr Ting who was, purely coincidentally, also in California.
sentences.cn: 他们立即与丁博士联系，真是巧得很，他也在加利福尼亚。

sentences.en: This lawful process coincidentally clothes life in a spiritual looking garb.
sentences.cn: 巧合的是,这一受自然规律支配的过程给生命披上了件貌似灵性的外衣.

sentences.en: Two Manchester City fans, Geoff Watts and Howard Davies, coincidentally wrote similar letters to the club.
sentences.cn: 说来也巧，两个曼城队球迷杰夫·沃茨和霍华德·戴维斯给俱乐部写了类似的信。

words.tran_cn: 一致的；符合的；同时发生的
巧合的；符合的；暗合的；一致的

trans.tran_cn: 巧合地，同时发生地，一致地
trans.tran_en: You use coincidentally when you want to draw attention to a coincidence
